channel.title: Clip Planes on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Clip Planes on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Example 5: Clip Planes
item.description:
Example 5: Clip Planes

     This example is also available on YouTube.

Introduction

In this example, we are using the SoGVRDrawOnPlane module to define the currently visible slice from a 2D view as a clip plane in 3D.

Steps to do

Develop your network

First we need to develop the network to scroll through the slices. Add a LocalImage module to your workspace and select the file ProbandT1 from MeVisLab demo data.

item.title: Example 6: DICOM RT Visualization in MeVisLab – RTSTRUCT and RTDOSE Workflow
item.description:
Example 6: DICOM RT Visualization in MeVisLab – RTSTRUCT and RTDOSE Workflow

Abstract

This tutorial explains how to load and visualize DICOM RT data in MeVisLab step by step. You will learn how to:

  • Load CT and RTSTRUCT data.
  • Visualize RTSTRUCTs as colored CSOs.
  • Show labels next to each RTSTRUCT contour. We use the ExtractRTStruct module and explain each step in a simple way with screenshots.

Introduction

In this example, we are using the SoGVRDrawOnPlane module to define the currently visible slice from a 2D view as a clip plane in 3D. DICOM RT files are essential in radiotherapy planning. They include:
